bilingual.source: The elevator's descent was smooth and quick.
bilingual.target: 电梯的下降平稳而迅速。

bilingual.source: The plane glided smoothly during its descent.
bilingual.target: 飞机在下降过程中平稳地滑行。

bilingual.source: The airplane began its descent as it approached the airport.
bilingual.target: 飞机在接近机场时开始下降。

bilingual.source: The descent into the valley took longer than expected.
bilingual.target: 下降到山谷比预期花费的时间更长。

bilingual.source: The pilot checked the vsi before making the descent.
bilingual.target: 飞行员在下降前检查了垂直速度指示器。

bilingual.source: The hiker carefully planned his descent to avoid any accidents.
bilingual.target: 登山者仔细计划他的下降以避免任何事故。

bilingual.source: The descent from the mountain was more challenging than the ascent.
bilingual.target: 从山上下降比上山更具挑战性。

bilingual.source: The skydiver pulls the parachute cord to slow down his descent.
bilingual.target: 跳伞者拉动降落伞绳索以减缓下降速度。

bilingual.source: The parafoil caught the wind perfectly, allowing for a smooth descent.
bilingual.target: 翼伞完美地抓住了风，使下降变得平稳。

bilingual.source: The pitch angle of the airplane determines its rate of ascent or descent.
bilingual.target: 飞机的俯仰角决定了它的上升或下降速度。

list.abstract: 世系（英文：pedigree、genealogy），读音：shì xì，汉语词语，亦作“世繫（xì）”。是指家族世代相承的系统，也指宗派相承的系统。 相关句子有“例如，日本学者在辨贤首宗的世系时，就用了这方面的材料。”出自吕澂（chéng）的《中国佛学源流略讲》。

Descent - Fear of Men
I fall into nothingness
You pull me back to the light of day
You like it close next to me
And I don't know what's gonna change my mind
But I try for me time
Cause I am you
Cause I am you
What dreams may come
Why life is what it is
What dreams may come
I'm afraid to hurt myself
One more time where I am at
Body and all things are just for pain
When at surface when you sheltered me
But in time I love it
Cause I am you
Cause I am you
What dreams may come
Why life is what it is
What dreams may come
There is a sickness in our path
That keeps me from your door
There is a sickness in our path
That keeps me from your door
There is a sickness in our path
That keeps me from your door
There is a sickness in our path
That keeps me from your
I don't know what to say do not
I can't hide what I don't regret
Spending off my ride next to you
And when the days go by
I decide that I know
You're a man of mine
Cause I am you
Cause I am you
What dreams may come
Why life is what it is
What dreams may come
There is a sickness in our path
That keeps me from your door
There is a sickness in our path
That keeps me from your door
There is a sickness in our path
That keeps me from your door
There is a sickness in our path
I don't want to know

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

v. 为…去毒；为…解毒；戒毒；使（酗酒者）戒掉酒瘾；使（吸毒者）戒掉毒瘾；戒酒；变得无毒
v. 贬低；降低…的价值；降低…的重要性；使（货币）贬值
adj. 不光明正大的；狡诈的；阴险的；迂回曲折的
v. 移交；下放；分裂；转移；被继承；衰落
v. 将（时间；精力）用于（人；活动；事业）上；尽心竭力于…；降祸于；诅咒
v. 狼吞虎咽地吃；吞噬；吞没；摧毁；贪婪地快速读；心中充满
n. 互相依赖
